original_text: He said, ‘I will not continue to help them. I will see what happens to them when I leave them alone. They are children who do not obey me. They have not served me faithfully. He said, ‘I will not continue to help them. I will see what happens to them when I leave them alone. They are children who do not obey me. They have not served me faithfully. He said, ‘I will not continue to help them.
korean_text: 그가 말씀하시기를 내가 내 얼굴을 그들에게서 숨겨 그들의 종말이 어떠함을 보리니 그들은 심히 패역한 세대요 진실이 없는 자녀임이로다

sentences.original_text: I will not continue to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 그들을 돕지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will see what happens to them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 무슨 일이 일어나는지 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: They have not served me faithfully
I will not continue to help them
